answers.answer: I'd go in.....the blood work will tell you if you're anemic which could easily be the cause. That's what caused it for me.
I'm barely anemic. I got the test done a week ago.
I feel this way and I'm 32 weeks. I am anemic and was recently told I have gestational diabetes

question: I'm 31 weeks pregnant and most of the day I feel extremely weak and like I'm going to faint. I have been eating, drinking and sleeping right. I don't work. The hospital wanted me to come in and get blood work but my OB said it's because I'm moving to fast. It was really bad last night when I was just laying down! I don't know if I should go in or wait it out.
title: Feeling faint and extremely weak!
